title: How to prevent purchasing item by riot point!!!!!
body: It happened several times!! I really wonder know if riot can move the RP button to right or make a confirmation when purchasing by RP. It's so suc wrong click the RP button and buying the champion when u have 10000+ IP. I used all of my refundable chance due to the wrong click I have made.////////

replies.body:
A confirmation button could be a good idea, but unfortunately, I'm not on the design team, so you'll want to make a post with this suggestion on the [**Miscellaneous Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) if you'd like it to potentially have this seen by that team.

For now, I'd recommend taking it slow with your purchases you can be sure you're clicking the right purchase button. Let me know if you have any questions.
